title: Celebrate 100 years of Shimano w/ Limited Edition Photo book, Happy Hundred Strava challenge
content:
100 years. Whatever you’re referring to, that’s a serious chunk of time. More than most life times. After 100 years since that first 3.3.3. freewheels, Shimano’s portfolio has exploded. But even after a century, their dedication to precision seems unchanged. Shimano 100 Works Photo Book To kick off the festivities, Shimano has just unveiled a […]

The post Celebrate 100 years of Shimano w/ Limited Edition Photo book, Happy Hundred Strava challenge appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
